flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to stay 1000*0.2=<<1000*0.2=200>>200 pounds under the max
So he wants to stay under 1000-200=<<1000-200=800>>800 pounds
That means he can put 800-250=<<800-250=554>>554 pounds on the bar
#### 554

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 550, not 554. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
